array.element: Replace your WorldEdit selection with air by pressing Ctrl+Delete.
Select the region you're standing with by pressing Ctrl+N.
Press B to butcher mobs up to 10 blocks away. Modify with Ctrl to increase to 100. Modify with Shift to include friendly mobs.
Press V to toggle your vanish state.
Press Ctrl+Shift+V to expand your WorldEdit selection vertically.
Press C to toggle between creative and survival.
To show the button GUI press the key you set as your macro activate key.
Ctrl+Right/left click replaces the WorldEdit wand.
Ctrl+Shift+Right/left click replaces the WorldEdit compass.
Ctrl+Scroll wheel lets you scroll through handy tools in your currently selected hotbar slot.
Ctrl+Middle mouse replaces your hotbar with either the modtools2, redstone1, redstone2 or redstone3 kit.
Ctrl+history back on your mouse lets you repeat the last chat or button command.
WorldEdit history and clipboard commands are accessed with the equivalent text-editor-style keyboard shortcut. E.g. Ctrl+C.
Rotate your WorldEdit selection using Ctrl+R.
Toggle downfall by pressing T. Set the time to morning with Ctrl+M.
Undo VoxelSniper actions with Ctrl+U. Undo 10 of them with Ctrl+Shift+U.
Press H to go to your home in flatlands. Press Ctrl+H to go to your home in world.
Got a TerrainControl world and need to regen the chunk you're in? Press Ctrl+J.
Access a list of runnable macros by pressing L.
Teleport between floor levels with Ctrl+Scroll.

To show the button GUI press the key you set as your macro activate key.

Ctrl+Scroll wheel lets you scroll through handy tools in your currently selected hotbar slot.

Undo VoxelSniper actions with Ctrl+U. Undo 10 of them with Ctrl+Shift+U.
Press H to go to your home in flatlands. Press Ctrl+H to go to your home in world.
Got a TerrainControl world and need to regen the chunk you're in? Press Ctrl+J.
Access a list of runnable macros by pressing L.
